Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment3

Class CharacterRecordUtility

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment3.CharacterRecordUtility
public class CharacterRecordUtility
extends java.lang.Object
This class rearrange the detail in the csv file to list in a required order, and output the result as a separate file.
Author:
Wentao Lu

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<CharacterRecord> records
    Create a list to store all the value of each game character.
    private java.lang.String title
    it contains the title of the table as a whole String including the commas inside.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CharacterRecordUtility()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void loadFile()
    This method will load the file from the memory and put them into an array of CharacterReport class.
    void processFile()
    This method will first load the file into memory, then using different methods to rearrange the lists in different orders and then create or overwrite two csv files in the project root directory.
    private void saveFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
    This method will save the file into the project root location.
    private void sortAttackChance1()
    This method will sort the records by attackchance1 in an ascending order.
    private void sortName()
    This method will sort all the records by their names in an alphabetical order.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • records

      private java.util.List<CharacterRecord> records
      Create a list to store all the value of each game character.

    • title

      private java.lang.String title
      it contains the title of the table as a whole String including the commas inside.

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterRecordUtility

      public CharacterRecordUtility()

  • Method Details

    • processFile

      public void processFile()
      This method will first load the file into memory, then using different methods to rearrange the lists in different orders and then create or overwrite two csv files in the project root directory. These two csv sorts the data by name and attack1chance respectively.

    • loadFile

      private void loadFile()
      This method will load the file from the memory and put them into an array of CharacterReport class.

    • sortName

      private void sortName()
      This method will sort all the records by their names in an alphabetical order.

    • sortAttackChance1

      private void sortAttackChance1()
      This method will sort the records by attackchance1 in an ascending order.

    • saveFile

      private void saveFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method will save the file into the project root location.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name that will be used. If there is a file already using this name, the file will be overwritten.
